title: Contemporary Mangalsutra Necklace with Rose Gold Finish - "Aadhunika Soubhagya Mala"
materials: Base metal with Rose Gold Finish
features: Two-layered Mangalsutra design featuring delicate rose gold chains interspersed with traditional black 'potu' beads. The lower layer boasts a square-shaped CZ pendant set in a rose gold bezel, while the upper layer features a floral CZ accent. Clean lines and a minimalist aesthetic offer a modern take on the classic Mangalsutra.
occasions: Festivals. Perfect for the modern South Indian woman who values tradition with a contemporary flair.
description: Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear. The rose gold finish adds a touch of modern elegance. High-quality CZ stones offer brilliant sparkle at an accessible price point. Represents marital bliss and commitment with a subtle, stylish approach. Perfect for those seeking a more contemporary alternative to heavier traditional Mangalsutras.
